name: TheMarcandLowellShow
0:
”Alexa, open Mandle Show”
”Alexa, start Mandle Show”
”Alexa, ask Mandle Show”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mandle show
Developer Terms of Use
des:
How many times has this happened to you? You download a podcast only to hear within the first five minutes it a piece of junk. Well we promise you, with the Marc & Lowell Show, you’ll get to at least six minutes before making that claim. Television and radio broadcaster Lowell Melser and RELM's own Marc Ronick share their tales of over 30 years of friendship and tackle the tough issues of life, pop culture and more. So if you’re in the mood for something different and funny yet strangely familiar,, this is the podcast for you.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Mandle Show to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Mandle Show to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
